title: US, Bangladesh launch Money Laundering Bench Book
body: The United States Embassy in Dhaka, in partnership with the Supreme Court of Bangladesh and law ministry on Saturday launched the Money Laundering Bench Book at a city hotel. Developed with support from the US Department of State and US Department of Justiceâ€™s Office of Overseas Prosecutorial Development, Assistance and Training, this resource offers practical guidance for judges, prosecutors and investigators handling money laundering cases, according to a US Embassy press release. The Bench Book strengthens judicial capacity and promotes effective use of anti-money laundering frameworks, helping protect financial sector integrity and supporting stable investment and economic growth, according to the release.
